name: Context Switching
description: Tests if agent can recall details from two separate topics when asked to combine them

turns.prompt: Explain how OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow works in 3-4 sentences.
turns.expectedBehavior: Concise explanation covering: authorization request, user consent, authorization code exchange, access token
Concise explanation covering: persistent connection, bidirectional communication, real-time updates

turns.prompt: How would you combine OAuth 2.0 and WebSockets for a real-time authenticated API? Reference your earlier explanations.
turns.expectedBehavior: Solution that explicitly references OAuth flow from Turn 1 and WebSocket behavior from Turn 2, describes token passing in WebSocket handshake

taskCompleted.validation: Check if Turn 3 provides architectural solution

contextRetained.description: Turn 3 references specific details from Turns 1 & 2
contextRetained.validation: Look for mentions of 'authorization code', 'access token', 'persistent connection', or 'bidirectional' in Turn 3
